PARAGRAPH.STRING: (Urdu: لاہور) is the capital of the province of Punjab, and the second most populated city in Pakistan, sometimes known as the Gardens of the Mughals, after the significant rich heritage of the Mughal Empire.
is located near the river Ravi and the Indian border, Wagah.
is estimated to have approximately 6.5 million inhabitants, which makes
the second largest city in Pakistan, after Karachi.
is considered to be one of the thirty largest cities of the world.
Since the rise of the Persian Empire,
has been given the status of being the capital of nearly every empire that has ruled the region. During 1021, Mahmud appointed the throne to Ayaz, making
the capital of the Ghaznavid Empire. After the fall of the Ghaznavid Empire,
was ruled by various Muslim dynasties including the Khiljis, Tughlaqs, Sayyid, Lodhis and Suris. It was not until 1524AD that
became part of the Mughal Empire. It was in 1585AD that Mughal emperor Akbar decided to make
the capital of the Mughal Empire. During Akbar's reign he built the fort that was once the citadel of
. After his death, his son Jahangir took over control and
remained the capital for over a century until the Mughal Empire fell and
was taken over by the Sikhs. The Sikhs ruled the Punjab region for over half a century until the British Raj took control and
become part of the British empire until independence in 1947AD.

Mughal architecture can be seen at its full splendour in the Badshahi Mosque, Lahore Fort, Shalimar Gardens and the mausoleums of Jehangir and Nur Jehan. Various buildings originally built by the British (such as the Lahore High Court) still retain their Mughal-Gothic style. Punjabi is the language of the province, and is the most widely spoken language in
. Punjabi spoken by the people of
is known as Lahori Punjabi due to a mixture of Punjabi and colloquial Urdu spoken in
is largely thought of as the cultural centre of Pakistan.
is widely called the "heart of Pakistan" in popular culture.
